data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.                                                                                                                                                           
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=5rL5Klp9CJcQ7kNvgGuKR8s&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBryTfS-D2gpqBl_iu4xZhUxKE8c8qjSLOpozyVlCb9SQ&oe=66E02BB7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=nJMmVOdtvpYQ7kNvgESae3z&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDbAwNg-UkBftNSLWGIS0ae-qiQKG5XTtjAMzbYUeV-wg&oe=66E03952)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=RZtJrHQtvkkQ7kNvgFZsIj9&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC0kIitmQ3abBKNFyEpgn7zaioCxCzkH1X8tcYkbrSttQ&oe=66E02489)
